author: cms-sw
body: Building `analyses.dat` and `analyses.dat` cause `libRivet.so` to be loaded - which could've been built with vector instructions not supported by build machine. While the failure of command used to generate `doc/analists/analyses.{dat,json}` does not cause built to fail, lack of generated files does fail the build.
title: Add patch to disable builting Rivet documentation
